    • Method Detail

      • readNetworksCount

        void readNetworksCount(ReadListener<java.lang.Integer> listener)
        Read will initialize networks array. This array will be sorted by RSSI (highest on index 0). It is guaranteed that networks array won't change between reads.

      • selectNetworkToRead

        void selectNetworkToRead(int index,
                         WriteListener listener)
        Points an index of a network that details should be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        index - index of a network.
        listener - write listener.

      • readSelectedNetwork

        void readSelectedNetwork(ReadListener<Network> listener)
        Reads details of a network previously pointed by selectNetworkToRead(int, WriteListener) method.
        Parameters:
        listener - read listener.
